meanings.definition: The production of an electric current by the junction of two different metals when heated.
meanings.sent1: Thermoelectricity can create electricity from heat.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study thermoelectricity to make better power sources.
meanings.sent3: The curious robot learned about thermoelectricity and started dancing from excitement.
meanings.sent4: In the world of thermoelectricity, metals become like magic wires carrying energy.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a world where thermoelectricity powers everything around us.

meanings.definition: The generation of electricity from a temperature difference.
meanings.sent1: Thermoelectricity helps convert temperature changes into power.
meanings.sent2: People use thermoelectricity to harness energy from hot and cold areas.
meanings.sent3: The penguin community discovered thermoelectricity and now has heated igloos.
meanings.sent4: In nature, thermoelectricity is like a silent conductor of energy between hot and cold.
meanings.sent5: The concept of thermoelectricity is like a bridge connecting heat and electricity.
